data.name: Steel Division 2 - Reinforcement Pack #13 - Lucky 13
data.detailed_description:
Take command of two brand-new divisions in the free Lucky 13 DLC: the varied Axis adhoc Panzerdivision Tatra and the fast-moving Allied Task Force Butler.

Panzerdivision Tatra
The Axis Panzerdivision Tatra features a host of different units hurriedly formed in response to the Slovak Uprising in August 1944. Deploy well-equipped SS Sturmgrenadiers alongside Landesschützen and local Volksturm, while a strong Luftwaffe flies top cover. Armor units range from the older Panzer 38(t), nimble Hetzer tank destroyers, to a handful of Tiger Es. Panzerdivision Tatra can hold its own as a mechanized battlegroup, compensating for a lack in AA with its strength in infantry and air support.

Task Force Butler
The Allied Task Force Butler was a fast-moving American battlegroup formed after the landings of Operation Dragoon in southern France, August 1944. The battlegroup’s recon units are top-notch, from Cavalry Scouts to Greyhounds and M3A1 Cavalry half-tracks, but suffers in the number of infantry available. Reinforcements are provided by the French resistance and elite OSS special forces. Allied air forces provide some much-needed support. Task Force Butler is built for speed and maneuver warfare, striking fast and hard before relocating.

The new divisions in this free Reinforcement Pack were originally presented as part of our community-voted Nemesis DLC offerings. Both feature new units, meticulously researched and recreated in Steel Division 2, and can be deployed in solo, coop, or multiplayer.

New Units

  • Panzer 38(t) light tank
  • Volksturm squads
  • Sturmgrenadier (MG-42) squads
  • PaK 37(t) 47mm AT
  • Cavalry Scouts squads
  • M3A1 Cavalry recon half-track
  • M8 Cavalry Greyhound as a “tank”
  • OSS elite special forces
  • FFI Ralliés German deserter squads
  • FFI MG-34 squads
  • FFI 2-in mortar squads
  • FFI Saboteurs recon engineers

Reinforcement Pack - Lucky 13 is free to all owners of Steel Division 2.

data.short_description: Take command of two brand-new divisions for Steel Division 2 in the free Lucky 13 DLC: the varied Axis Panzerdivision Tatra and the fast-moving Allied Task Force Butler.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7 with Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G4920 (Legacy: i3-2100) , AMD Athlon 200GE
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030 (Legacy: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450), AMD Radeon RX 460 (Legacy: ATI Radeon HD 5570)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7 with Service Pack 1
  • Processor: 4 cores Intel | AMD CPU (Intel i3-8100, AMD Ryzen 3 1200)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 3 GB (Legacy: Nvidia Geforce GTX 780), AMD Radeon RX 580 (Legacy: AMD Radeon R9 290X)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
